title: Crew-8 astronauts remain mum about post-splashdown medical issue
summary: The three NASA astronauts who returned to Earth on the Crew-8 mission declined to discuss the medical issue that prompted a trip to the hospital after their return and, for one of them, an overnight stay.

title: Santa Maria to be Landing Site of Inaugural Space Rider Flight
summary: The Portuguese Space Agency announced 8 November that the island of Santa Maria has been chosen as the landing site for the inaugural flight of Space Rider. Space Rider is an eight-metre reusable orbital vehicle designed to serve as a robotic laboratory in orbit, enabling scientific research and technology demonstrations. The vehicle is capable of […]

title: Crew-8 Will Reveal Hospitalization Details “In Fullness of Time”

title: Sols 4357–4358: Turning West
summary: Earth planning date: Wednesday, Nov. 6, 2024 Sols 4357–4358: Turning West If you’ve ever driven down a road that’s in need of repaving, you’ll know that it can be an uncomfortable experience. title: Ex-Google exec attracts financial backers for LEO megaconstellation
summary: Logos Space has early financial commitments needed to deploy 1,000 satellites for global broadband coverage, according to the former Google executive behind the one-year-old megaconstellation startup.
